name: Shut-In
description:
The banners read QUARANTINE

After a global pandemic has forced everyone inside, many have found new ways to live alone and keep their minds sharp.

However, that was the year 2020.

2021 was a different story....

It has been 10 months since the Quarantine ended, and while most went back outside to a new world, some have never ventured out of their homes, never leaving to see the sun or the sky.

They are called Shut-Ins

They are afraid...

Shut-In is a quick but rich experience, where you play as a character shut inside for 10 months after quarantine. The game explores how an individual's thoughts can take form, from a long period of isolation and not seeing the outside. The game was made for the 2020 Game Dev Underground Game Jam .

 Thanks! Enjoy!

Controls-

WASD 

SPACE to jump. 

ESC to exit game
